definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.chinese: 那個兇殘的匪首被處決了。

sentences.english: May the aroma of books seep into our lives, and thereby changes cruelty and violence into peace and gentleness.
sentences.chinese: 讓書香化爲生命的馨香，讓暴戾兇殘化爲祥和溫柔。

sentences.english: The treacherous Red Ribbon Army threatens a peaceful village.
sentences.chinese: 兇殘的黑綢軍正威脅着一個和平的小村莊。

sentences.english: The cities make ferocious men because they make corrupt men.
sentences.chinese: 城市會使人變得兇殘，因爲它使人腐化墮落。

sentences.english: The hybrid child of a murderous utopia and a disenchanted époque.
sentences.chinese: 血腥兇殘的烏托邦和幻滅的時代產下了混血兒。

sentences.english: Many American colonists believed that the English tax collectors were too heavy-handed.
sentences.chinese: 許多美洲殖民地的人認爲英國稅吏兇殘手辣。

sentences.english: Fierce warriors wearing mail armour and armed with a wicked axe. Act as bodyguards for Chieftains.
sentences.chinese: 兇殘的步行親衛騎兵裝備鍊甲和戰斧，護衛親王大公。

sentences.english: It was a clinical operation, but awesome in the scale of its savagery.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個臨牀手術，但恐怖的是兇殘到如此規模。

sentences.english: Ponce was as heartless and unfeeling as any wild beast.
sentences.chinese: 幫塞毫無心肝，兇殘猶如野獸。

sentences.english: Shenzhen police, this is a very heinous cases might chief instigator.
sentences.chinese: 深圳警方透露，這是一個可能非常兇殘的要案主兇。

sentences.english: People imprecated evil on the cruel king.
sentences.chinese: 人們祈求降禍於這個兇殘的國王。

sentences.english: His brutal nature, notorious, it is always less than fear.
sentences.chinese: 他兇殘成性，惡名遠播，人們總是避之惟恐不及。

sentences.english: These meetings ought not to be sanctuaries for factious and flagitious fellows.
sentences.chinese: 這些聚會不應成爲幫派鬥毆和兇殘的人的庇護所。

sentences.english: They committed the most atrocious cruelties.
sentences.chinese: 他們犯下了極其兇殘的暴行。

sentences.english: The Russian eagerness to slaughter Poland's military leadership was not simply born out of savagery.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯渴望殺戮波蘭軍隊領導不僅僅是出於兇殘。

sentences.english: Heavily armoured, strong attacking infantry, skilled in the use of the double handled axe.
sentences.chinese: 重裝斧兵兇殘無比，攻擊能力極爲強悍。

definition: to lift sth up/to elevate sb/to honor sb (with compliments, gifts, promotions etc)/to show great regard/to speak highly/Taiwan pr. [tai2 ju3]
